item.title: guantanamo airlines
item.description: Here are some really messed up pictures: one, two, three, four, five, sixPrisoners of war rule!! I have mirrored the pictures here.Check out Ernie’s house of whoopass. It seems like a rather humorous site. Check out how much I rule (not safe for work :P)
